snippet.title: Evolution of Sins II Pt. 1 - Top New Features
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1575940

Ironclad Games and Stardock proudly present Sins of a Solar Empire II, the long anticipated sequel to Sins of a Solar Empire: Rebellion. 

This video is an overview of the main new and improved features in Sins of a Solar Empire II. Sins of a Solar Empire: Rebellion was the culmination of five years of development on top of the original Sins of a Solar Empire game and now, Sins of a Solar Empire II brings so many new and improved features over Sins Rebellion that we're going to need a whole series to show you it all. 

--- 
Website - www.sinsofasolarempire2.com
Discord - https://discord.gg/sinsofasolarempire
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/sinsofasolarempire/
X - https://twitter.com/sinsofasolaremp
Reddit -  https://www.reddit.com/r/SoSe/
